column2: "Na Aaronmba no hɔn mu nkyekyɛmu nye yinom. Aaron ne mba; Nadab na Abihu
column3: Eleazar na Itamar."

column2: "Na Nadab na Abihu dzii hɔn egya enyim wuwui
column3: na woennya mba: dɛm ntsi Eleazar na Itamar bedzii asɔfo."

column2: "Na David kyekyɛɛ hɔn mu
column3: mekyerɛ Zadok a ofi Eleazarmba mu
column4: na Ahimelek a ofi Itamarmba mu
column5: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn edwumayɛ dzibew tse wɔ hɔn som no mu."

column2: "Na wohun Eleazarmba mu mbarimba etsitsir pii seen Itamarmba mu
column3: na wɔkyekyɛɛ hɔn mu: Eleazarmba nyaa egyanom efi etsitsir duesia

column2: "Dɛm na wosii dze tonto kyekyɛɛ hɔn mu
column3: yinom nye yinom; na krɔnkrɔnbea asafohen na Nyankopɔn n’asafohen no nyina fi Eleazarmba mu

column2: "Na ɔkyerɛwfo Netanel a ofi Levifo mu no ne ba Semaia kyerɛɛw hɔn wɔ ɔhen
column3: na asafohen
column6: na asɔfo na Levifo egyanom efiefi mu etsitsir no enyim: woyii egyanom fi kor maa Eleazar
column7: na woyii kor so maa Itamar."

column2: "Afei kyɛfa a odzi kan no bae maa Jehoiarib
column3: dza otsia ebien no bae maa Jedaia;"

column2: "dza otsia ebiasa no bae maa Harim
column3: dza otsia anan no bae maa Seorim;"

column2: "dza otsia enum no bae maa Malkija
column3: dza otsia esia no bae maa Mijamin;"

column2: "dza otsia esuon no bae maa Hakoz
column3: dza otsia awɔtwe no bae maa Abija;"

column2: "dza otsia akron no bae maa Jesua
column3: dza otsia du no bae maa Sekania;"

column2: "dza otsia dubiako no bae maa Eliasib
column3: dza otsia duebien no bae maa Jakim;"

column2: "duebiasa no bae maa Huppa
column3: dza otsia duanan no bae maa Jesebeab;"

column2: "dza otsia duenum no bae maa Bilga
column3: dza otsia duesia no bae maa Immer;"

column2: "duesuon no bae maa Hezir
column3: duawɔtwe no bae maa Hap-pizez;"

column2: "dza otsia duakron no bae maa Petahia
column3: eduonu no bae maa Jehezkel;"

column2: "dza otsia eduonu biako no bae maa Jakin
column3: dza otsia eduonu ebien no bae maa Gamul;"

column2: "dza otsia eduonu ebiasa no bae maa Delaia
column3: na dza otsia eduonu anan no bae maa Maazia."

column2: "Iyi nye hɔn edwumayɛ dzibew wɔ hɔn som no mu
column3: dɛ wɔnhɛn EWURADZE fie dɛ mbrɛ atɔrmuadze a wɔnam hɔn egya Aaron nsa do dze maa hɔn no tse

column2: "Na Levimba nkaa no dze: Amram mba dze
column3: Subael; Subael mba dze

column2: "Rehabia dze; Rehabia mba dze
column3: Ishia otsitsir no."

column2: "Izharfo dze
column3: Selomot; Selomot mba dze

column2: "Na Hebron ne mba; Jeria otsitsir
column3: Amaria tsia hɔ

column2: "Uziel ne mba
column3: Mika; Mika mba dze

column2: "Mika no nua
column3: Ishia: Ishia mba dze

column2: "Merari ne mba; Mahili na Mushi: Jaazia ne mba; Beno."
"Merari ne mba; Jaazia dze
column3: Beno

column2: "Mahili dze; Eleazar
column3: ɔno oennya mba."

column2: "Kish dze; Kish ne mba
column3: Jerameel."

column2: "Na Mushi ne mba; Mahili
column3: Eder
column4: na Jerimot. Woyinom nye Levifo mba dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee no."

column2: "Woyinom so twee tonto dɛ hɔn nuanom Aaronmba no ara wɔ ɔhen David
column3: na Zadok na Ahimelek
column4: na asɔfo no na Levifo egyanom efi mu etsitsir no enyim; otsitsir no n’egyanom efi dɛ no nua kuma no dze no ara."
